string.text: Hey, youve heard bout that shiny thing popping up at the electro anomaly field?
Yeh, big brains from the eco lab paying fat rubles. If its legit, we are talking life changing cash.
I no like. Last time I chase sparkly rock, me end up with half my face missing. Stay away.
Word is, that thing warps the air and could fry your eyeballs at ten paces. Only fools touch it.
Quite intriguing...such anomalous phenomena often yield unprecedented scientific data, though perilous.
Found a little rock glowing green. Think itll fetch a price?
Glow stone, huh? Better wrap that sucker in lead or youll glow too warm funeral, mate.
Could be legit artifact. But careful: handle with tweezers, not mittsâ€”bare hands bad juju.
Eh, probably just hot slag from reactor. Still, fence guys might pay up if you hype it right.
Fascinating discovery, its spectral luminescence suggests high photon emission. Recommend analysis.
Where is the next dig? Usual haunts are picked clean.
After the last blast, anomalies drift north. Try old watchtower grounds when fog lifts.
Dry spots? Sweet. Fewer rats to tussle. Ill take twice the haul for half the heat.
Someone said Duty boys marked fresh nodes by the riverbank. But they are paranoid bastards.
No clue. Zone keeps her secrets. One day you are king, next you are chow for mutants.
Spotted a trader hawking about a "heart of the Zone" relic near the bar, anyone know what that is?
Heart of the Zone? Ha! Thats just fancy talk for a Psi coral chunk. Worth a handful of rubles, tops.
I met that trader last month, sold me a dud. Left me puking for two days. Avoid, comrade.
Intriguing nomenclature. If genuine, its anomalous resonance could yield potent psionic feedback.
Bro, dude is a scammer. He labels any glowing pebble heart to bilk fresh meat outta their cash.
Heard whispers of a living artifact near the old power station. Moves on its own. Real or rumor?
Living artifact? You mean that twitchy blob folks say skulks in the dark? Pure folk's tale, I reckon.
I seen it with my own eyes..pulsing amber mass, slithering away when you get close. Gave me nightmares.
Such reports often stem from collective hysteria after emissions. Unlikely any creature exists.
Man, I chased that thing until my boots fell apart. It vanished inside a crevice, never saw a relic so sly.
Word is, that new artifact bends time. Got anyone seen clocks spinning backward?
Time warp trinket? Thats pure Zone fairy tale. You will lose more than minutes chasing that nonsense.
I touched it once. felt like reliving my worst nightmares. Never again. Time is a curse here.
Fascinating. A chronometric anomaly could revolutionize our understanding of Zone physics if its real.
I saw my watch spin like crazy once, before it heat up to the point i had to chuck it away. Scared me good.
Heard creepy crawlers hoarding shiny bits in the mutant burrow. Anyone brave enough to scout it?
Mutant stash? You daft? Those packs guard their loot with claws and teeth. no thanks.
Last hunter in there came back with a broken leg and missing ribs. If you value life, stay clear.
It is true, Psi beasts collect irradiated fragments. A well placed mine might clear them outâ€¦ at risk.
I once filched a trinket while they slept. Heart pounding, I swear I heard growls in my skull.
Some claim there is a singing artifact, emits tones that lure you closer. Sound familiar?
Singing stone yeah, locals call it the Sirens Tear. Folks get hypnotized, wander into anomalies.
I hear no song. just my own heartbeat when I touched it. Then I ran before the zone could eat me.
Acoustic feedback from micro fractures could explain the tones..pure physics! no magic involved.
If it sings, I aint sticking around to duet with. Got scars enough already.
Spotted a lone sniper clutching a teardrop shaped relic and whispering to it. wtf.
Ah, thats the Echo Shard. Supposedly it replays lost voices. Watch your sanity, or itll echo forever.
I heard that whisperer just babbles nonsense, claims of lost loves and old wars. Probably cracked in the head.
Fascinating psychological tool, if it modulates auditory cortex, we might map memories through neural resonance.
I got one once, kept hearing mums lullaby. Nearly cried myself to sleep every night till I tossed it.
Spotted a tiny orb that shrinks your packs weight, real or more Zone tall tale?
Weight shrinker? Might be the Light Core artifact. Heard it bends gravity if it's not a busted trinket junk.
Last time I believed that, I spilled half my ammo when it snapped back. Never trust weight games here.
Literature on gravitonic artifacts is sparse, but a micro singularity effect could account for reduced mass.
Bro, its legit. I hauled twice the loot till I hit a bump. Felt like wings on my shouldersâ€¦until crash.
Caught wind of a mirror like shard that shows your worst fear. Anyone dare test it?
Mirror of Dread? No thanks, I've seen nightmares that still crawl under my skin when I blink.
Im not scared of shadows. But glass that knows your soul? Better leave that devils toy in the dirt.
From a cognitive science view, such an artifact could induce a hallucinatory feedback loop via brain wave entrainment. Further testing required.
I cracked it once, saw my own grave. Apparently spent a week muttering to myself. Never again.
Someone’s been pushing fake medkits around. Looks real ‘til you need it, then you bleed out clutching gauze and chalk.
The fuck, we need to look into that.
Bet it’s those black market rats again. Cut corners, sell to rookies, then vanish.
Zone’s dangerous enough without your lifeline being a placebo. Someone needs to hang for that.
I test mine before heading out. No seal? No sale. Not dying because some scumbag watered down adrenaline.
Found this weird pyramid-shaped crystal near Jupiter. Glows when mutants are near. Anyone seen similar?
That's a Hunter's Beacon! Rare find. Monolith fanatics pay top rubles for those death traps.
Burn it. Last stalker carrying one got swarmed by snorks in his sleep.
Fascinating! Possibly psionic resonance acting as organic proximity detector.
Does the "Soul" artifact actually heal mental wounds? Or just Zone fairytale?
Heals? More like borrows sanity. You'll be smiling while bleeding out.
Traded mine after it made me forget my own name for three days.
Psychotropic properties confirmed. Ecologists pay triple for intact specimens.
Bloodsucker pack spotted near the old factory. Stay alert!
Christ, again? Third fucking sighting this week Zone is going apeshit.
Cheers for the tip. Ill snake around, don't fancy becoming mutant chow.
Better grease up the double barrel. Those leech fiends wont know what hit them.
The factory is a fucking deathtrap, anyone daft enough to wander in deserves what they get.
Has anyone else noticed more mutants than usual lately?
Yeah, like they are massing up for a fucking invasion. Real shitshow out there.
More mutants, more bounties. My pockets are thanking the Zone today.
Might be the storms, creatures feel the charge before we do. Nature is twisted here.
I do seem to encounter more recently, they must be breeding more or some shit.
Spotted a pack of pseudogiants by the swamp, absolutely massive. Anyone got eyes?
Pseudogiants? Fuck me, that is asking for a quick trip to the afterlife.
I saw them too, looked like walking towers.
Terrifying specimens, probably mutated by deep water anomalies.
Man, Id rather wrestle a pseudodog than meet those cunts head on with a squad fully geared.
Anyone heard growling near the old train cars at night? Sounded unnatural.
Yeah, that is the wretched dog things prowling. Give them a flare and watch them scatter.
Me? I sleep with earplugs. Let the poor sods howl at ghosts, they wont get me.
Acoustic predator behavior increasing, screams replicate pack cohesion. Fascinating, yet deadly.
Fucking hell same, I nearly shit myself last night. Kept expecting to feel hot breath on my neck.
Heard the snorks are swarming near the tunnel entrance. Anyone brave enough to clear them?
Snorks? Nah, fuck that. I quit after one nearly tore off my arm.
Im gearing up, got new rounds for the SPAS. Lets teach those gurgling freaks a lesson.
Observing group hunting tactics snorks coordinate via potential sonar clicks. Starting to consider some kind of heavy acoustic suppression.
Last bloke who tried said he heard voices in his head before the swarm hit. Spooky shit.
Saw a lone chimera slinking through the cornfields at duskâ€”looked pissed. Heads up!
Hm, chimeras don't generally wander alone. Somethings really fucked up if its solo.
Chimeras freak me the fuck out, i see one im OUT the fucking place, I don't give a fuck what you guys think.
Interesting deviation from pack behavior, could indicate territorial pressure or a wounded alpha.
Id give my left smaller nut to bag that bastard, but aint stupid enough to try solo.
Heard whisper of a controller haunting the substation tunnels, anyone got proof?
Controller in the tubes? I almost had my brain scrambled last week, pure psychic hell.
I aint superstitious, but I saw lights blink without wires and then a voice in my head.
Electromagnetic anomalies could explain auditory hallucinations, though psionic field interactions remain uncharted.
Bullshit rumor, unless you fancy getting your skull vacuum cleaned, stay the fuck away from those tunnels.
Rogue pack of pseudodogs tearing through convoys on the clearance road, any backup teams?
Pseudodogs on the clearance? Fucking brilliant, no safe route left. I am bugging out tonight.
Got given orders. set up ambush with flashbangs. Those buggers hate bright lights.
Pack coordination suggests higher cognitive function, could be a new subspecies adapting to patrol patterns.
I went in solo, came out minus half my gear. don't be a hero; bring friends or don't bother.
Anyone else got scratched by those freaky cat things near the barn? Getting weird rashes.
Fucking hell, those scratches will rot your arm if you aint careful.
I patched myself up with vodka and iodine, still itching like mad. Might need medics help.
Dermal irritation from their saliva indicates potent enzymatic agents, recommend topical antivenom creams.
I don't trust any mutant pussy. One scratch and you are a walking biohazard.
Pseudodog pups following me near Garbage. Shoot or leave?
Kill the litter. Momma's tracking you through them.
Lead them to bandit camp. Free clean-up crew.
Fascinating! Juvenile pack behavior suggests higher social intelligence!
Burnt Fuzz mutants near Brain Scorcher - new variant?
Psi-burned zombies. Headshots don't work - burn the bodies.
Monolith experiments gone wrong. Avoid unless you want your mind fried.
Sidorovich is ripping us off again. His prices are getting ridiculous!
What else is new? That fat bitch has been doing it for years.
Try the other traders. Competition might make him reconsider.
Supply and demand, friend. Not many merchants brave enough to work here.
At least he's reliable. Rather pay more than get shot for my gear.
Got a fat stack of ammo but need medkits, anyone wanna swap?
Ammo for medkits? Hell yes, just don't try to short me, or Ill unload on you.
Im low on bandages, but I got a couple of Morphine shots. Fair trade?
Supplies are tight. Id only do that if you toss in a couple of those 5.45s to sweeten the deal.
Interesting proposal. It will accept, on condition you mention this favor when I need extraction intel.
Heard there is a buyer for Intel on enemy patrol routes, anyone got maps to sell?
Maps? I may have something that interests you. I will trade for a scoped rifle and extra mags.
Maybe talk to Sidorovichs mole down by the bar. He deals in whispers, not toys.
From a strategic standpoint, patrol intel shifts with emissions, stale maps are worse than none.
Look, I aint your cartographer. But trade me a medkit and i will sketch you part of the eastern flank.
Saw a blackmarket fence offering electric grenades, worth the risk?
Electric grenades? Sounds like suicide by shock. Id stick to good old frag.
Ive used them, stun biocreatures dead cold. But theyre temperamental. Handle with gloves.
From an engineering view, the minicapacitors could overload under humidity, high failure rate.
Fuck yeah, grab them! Nothing says surprise like a lightning blast in a burrow of blind beasts.
Need .45 ACP ammo. Will trade two fresh antirads.
Deal. Meet at dead truck north of Rostok. Come alone.
Antirads for bullets? You'll regret that when your skin starts peeling.
Who buys mutant trophies? Got fresh chimera claws.
Saw Sakharov paying for biological samples yesterday.
Duty buys 'em for their "wall of horrors" at the barrier.
My detector has been beeping non stop either Im about to score big or get fried
Both, knowing this shithole you are probably dying rich
Maybe give that piece of a shit a kick works better than half the junk in my pack
Could be that fucker just craving attention who knows in this dump
Silence means something shit is yet to happen so enjoy the racket while it lasts
Robbed a bandit earlier today, forced him to walk shoeless. Eh you gotta entertain yourself sometimes in the zone.
Should've shot a toe off too, just to teach him not to beg.
Nice. Maybe now he'll think twice before pulling a rusty Makarov on someone.
Hope he steps on a meatgrinder. Barefoot justice.
That’s mercy in the Zone. Next time, don’t leave him breathing.
Spilled my vodka in the mud great start to any day. feels bad.
Congrats you just watered the Zones only crop
Drink muddy vodka it builds character stalker.
Well at least the mud is sterile!
Better than losing bullets I guess
My boots just fell apart mid loot run, this fucking zone man
Best get duct tape or youll be slipping on your own blood
Boots last longer if you don't stomp mutant corpses in them
Survival tip use boots from dead stalkers never your own stash
Congrats you are officially shoeless and clueless welcome to the zone
Ate some mystery meat now my guts feel like they are doing backflips
Mystery meat is famous for mystery poison happy tripping
Next time cook it twice or turn it into mutant stew
Vodka cures all but that might kill you faster
At least you are not hungry now
Weapon keeps fucking jamming right when I needed it most thanks for nothing
Kick it a few times usually fixes your shitty luck
Use your knife while you fish out the blockage
Maybe you should carry less junk and clean your gun more
That sounds like a massive skill issue
Anyone know how to fix a busted gas mask filter? Duct tape isnt working.
If duct tape isnt working, you're not using enough duct tape.
Try the mechanics. They work miracles with junk parts.
Just get a new one. Your lungs will thank you later.
I use coffee filters in a pinch. Not recommended for heavy radiation though.
Battery on my NVG died fast as hell any tips to juice it up?
Swap in some fresh AAs or scavenge cells from dead geiger counters
Charge pack on a generator if you can find one without getting blasted
Juryrig a solar panel outta scrap glass and wiring but good luck
Or just learn to see in the dark like the rest of usNVGs are luxury
My AKs barrel is all shitfouled any quick clean tricks?
Use your shirt and half a bottle of petrol, better than nothing
Wire brush and bore solvent from the chem dealer does wonders
Barrel is shot if you need steel wool and elbow grease, no shortcuts
Fuck cleaning, just swap barrels and pray you find one
Scope is loose as hell how do I torque that mount?
Grab a spanner or wrench and tighten until it stops rattling
Stuck? Hit it with a rubber mallet, careful not to break that lens
Put a bit of thread locker on the screws so they don't back out
Or duct tape it like everything else you junkcollector
PSU on my PDA fucking fried cant get maps up, any repair hacks?
Toss a fresh fuse in there if you can scrounge one, saves your ass
Short the burnt traces with wire but youll need steady hands
Trade it in for a working unit or go fucking blind out there
Or just follow the sun and landmarks like some cavedweller
Best armor mod against chemical burns? Keep getting acid-spitted.
Layer rubber seals between plates. Stinks but saves skin.
Freedom sells spray-on sealant. Costs more than your gun.
Any advice for a rookie trying to not become mutant chow?
Keep your mouth shut and your boots laced silence saves your arse more than bullets.
Watch the skies for emissions, theyll cook your brains faster than a psiblast.
don't trust any mug who smiles too wide, theyll gut you for spare parts at first chance.
Learn to love the stink of napalm and vodka, only comforts youll find out here.
Im running low on meds whats your go to first aid tip?
Stitch cuts with fishing line and antiseptic from vodka makeshift doctoring 101.
Put on your big boy pants and figure it out.
Raw honey on wounds keeps infections at bay if you are brave enough to taste it.
Pray to whatever gods lurk in this hell hole and carry more bandages next time.
How do you handle the loneliness out here?
I talk to my rifle its the only friend that wont stab you in the back.
Cigarettes and KINO under the stars, misery loves company. Even if its your own.
Whistle some tunes, Zone echoes carry farther than normal voices.
Lonely? Embrace it. Out here, silence is a weapon and your only ally.
Whats your nightmare run, what killer makes you shiver?
Bloodsuckers at night...hearing that slurp before they dive is pure terror.
Controllers messing with your mind...seeing your dead mates begging you to stop.
Poltergeist anomalies throwing debris like grenades, no blast radius warning.
Radstorms in the open, feels like being microwaved alive and there is no cover.
How do you secure your camp at night without attracting mutants?
Set up a tripwire with cans or empty shells, noise alert without bright lights.
Dig shallow foxholes and sleep staggered watches. Better one less snooze than mutant snack.
A simple heat lamp rigged to a motion sensor draws critters away from your actual spot.
Keep a smoker running. Mutants hate the smell. Plus you can cook ration packs off the coals.
Rations are running low while im out in the wild, any tips for finding edible plants out here?
Look for the small white fungus near water, boil it twice, gets rid of most toxins.
I wouldn't eat shit thats grown in the zone.
Edible roots grow near old soot patches,dig carefully, wash off radiation first.
Best bet is the canned goods from supply drops, they're very rare though. Forage only if you know your botanicals.
Anyone else see those green lights floating over the cooling towers last night?
Yeah, been happening more lately. Zone is up to something new.
Probably just swamp gas reflecting off Venus or some shit.
I shot at them. They scattered like they were alive. Creepy as fuck.
Keep your distance. Last guy who investigated never came back.
Found a room full of perfectly preserved STALKER bodies from what it seems like a decade ago. Not a mark on them.
Time anomaly maybe? Zone loves to fuck with the laws of physics.
Leave them be. Disturbing the past never ends well here.
Check their pockets for artifacts. Dead men don't need treasures.
My compass has been spinning nonstop for three days. What gives?
Magnetic anomaly forming nearby. Better relocate before it goes critical.
Same here. Electronics are going haywire too. Bad sign.
Could mean a big emission coming. Stock up on anti-rads.
Strange metal monolith appeared overnight in Red Forest. Zone playing tricks?
Monolith propaganda. Don't look at the symbols - drives men mad.
New anomaly type? Got radiation readings off the charts.
I wouldn't probe it.
Heard Duty and Freedom are negotiating a ceasefire.
Bullshit. Too much bad blood. Someone is gonna get played.
About time. This war is bleeding everyone dry.
Ceasefire just means they are planning something bigger.
Military has been recruiting some stalkers. Offering amnesty and citizenship.
Fuck that. Rather die free than live as their lapdog.
Might not be a bad deal. Zone's getting too dangerous.
Its a trap. They will use you then dispose of you.
Already know three guys who took the deal. Havent heard from them since.
Whats the best way to treat radiation sickness without proper meds?
Vodka and cigarettes. Old stalker remedy. Works 60% of the time.
Find some mushrooms near anomalies. Some absorb rads, some kill you. Good luck.
Best treatment is not getting irradiated in the first place without the right meds with you, genius. Get out of the zone civilian.
Running out of clean water. Any safe sources around here?
Don't risk it, try to barter with someone instead.
Boil everything twice. Add iodine tablets if you got them.
Trade for it. I'm sure there'll be someone overcharging for somewhat clean water.
New type of anomaly spotted. Turns organic matter to crystal.
Saw a dog walk into one. Came out looking like a glass sculpture.
Scientists would pay big for samples. If you survive collecting them.
Zone is getting more creative with how it kills us everyday.
That gravitational anomaly near the bridge is growing. I swear its grown twice as big since last week.
Time to find a new route. That things becoming a black hole.
Good. Maybe itll take out the bandits that go through there.
Growing anomalies could mean the Zone is expanding? We're all fucked...
You guys hear what happened to Yuris squad in the Red Forest?
Found them all standing in a circle, stone dead.
Controller work. Poor bastards probably shot each other.
Red Forest doesn't forgive. Shouldve known better.
Hey what ever happened to that rookie who said hed make it to the Wish Granter in a week?
Found his PDA near the first checkpoint. Lasted two days.
Zone has a way of humbling the arrogant real quick.
Another dreamer turned into mutant food. Tale as old as time.
Anyone else notice the birds acting weird lately? They're all flying south.
Animals always know before we do. Pack your shit.
Last time this happened we had emissions for three days straight.
Nature's early warning system. Better than any Geiger counter.
My detector's been going mental near the old factory. Anyone brave enough to check it out?
Probably just scrap metal. Not worth the radiation poisoning.
Could be a decent artifact. I'll split it 60-40 if you guide me there.
Last guy who went there came back speaking in tongues. Hard pass.
Group of fleshes got into our stash last night. Went through half our shit before we them down.
Shit, those things are getting bolder.
Damn, at least you'll get some stews out of them.
At least you got it. I've lost a few friends to them.
Found some premium vodka in a bunker today. Tastes like heaven after drinking brake fluid for weeks.
Lucky bastard. All I found was moldy MREs and dead rats.
Share the wealth, brother. I've got some decent ammo to trade.
Careful, might be contaminated or some shit. Zone has a way of poisoning everything good.
Guys, I think I'm being followed. Keep seeing the same shadow for the past three days.
Paranoia or not, trust your gut. Better safe than dead.
Could be a phantom. They like to stalk lone stalkers.
Probably just your mind playing tricks. Zone does that to everyone eventually.
Remember that old timer who used to tell stories about the early days? Found his body today.
Vasily? Damn, thought that crazy old fuck was immortal.
Zone claims everyone eventually. Even the legends.
He knew more about this place than anyone. What a waste.
My suit's giving me radiation warnings but the detector shows nothing. Anyone else having gear problems?
Electronics go haywire near psi-fields. Check for Controllers nearby.
Probably fried circuits. This place eats technology for breakfast.
Trust the Geiger over the suit. Suits lie, radiation doesn't.
Emission's coming and I'm stuck in the open. Anyone know shelters near the Cement Factory?
Underground tunnel system east side. Watch for the snorks though.
Too late to help now. If you're reading this after, you made it.
Concrete pipe about 200m north. Tight fit but it'll keep you breathing.
Spent three days tracking this artifact, turns out it was just a broken headlamp. FML.
Zone's playing jokes on you, stalker. Happens to the best of us.
At least you didn't get killed chasing phantom signals like Dmitri did.
Three days wasted, but three days alive. Count your blessings.
Anyone know what happened to Scar's group? They were supposed to check in two hours ago.
Radio's been dead all day. Might just be interference.
Scar's too stubborn to die easy. Give them time.
Two hours in the Zone might as well be two years. Start worrying.
This rookie keeps asking me about "safe paths" through anomaly fields. Should I tell him the truth?
Kid needs to learn somehow. Better from you than from a Whirligig.
There are no safe paths, only less deadly ones.
Tell him to throw bolts and pray. Same as the rest of us.
Pulled a Jellyfish artifact from a Vortex today. Burns like hell but my wounds are healing fast.
Careful, heard those things can cook you from the inside if you're not careful.
Good find. Those go for serious cash with the right buyer.
Keep it away from your vital organs. Had a buddy die from internal burns.
Military checkpoint's been abandoned for three days. Either they pulled out or something got them.
Probably tired of losing men to the Zone. Smart move.
Free passage for now, but they'll be back. They always come back.
Check for bodies. If there aren't any, they retreated. If there are... run.
My Geiger counter just died. Anyone got a spare? Will trade ammo.
Learn to read the signs. Plants, animals, your own body.
Got one but it's temperamental. 200 rounds of 9mm and it's yours.
Going in blind is suicide. Stay put until you get one.
Monolith broadcast was different today. Usually it's just static and whispers, but I swear I heard actual words.
Don't listen to that shit. That's how they get you.
Zone's messing with your head. Change frequencies.
What kind of words? Asking for a friend who's... curious.
Stumbled into a Controller's lair yesterday. Still can't remember how I got out alive.
Maybe you didn't get out. Maybe you're still there.
Gaps in memory are normal after psi-attacks. You'll be fine... probably.
Check yourself for bites or scratches. Controllers like to mark their toys.
Found a stash marked with Duty symbols, but the contents were Freedom gear. Someone's playing games.
Probably a trap. Those faction wars never really end.
Or someone's trying to start shit between them again.
Free gear is free gear. Politics don't matter when you're bleeding.
That new girl who joined last week? She's asking way too many questions about our routes and stashes.
Could be a spy. Or could just be thorough. Hard to tell these days.
Give her false info, see what happens. If word gets out, you'll know.
Paranoia keeps you alive in the Zone. Trust it.
Anyone got experience with those new anomaly detectors? Worth the price?
Saved my ass twice already. Detection range is insane.
Overpriced junk. My old Bear still works fine.
Battery life is shit. Dies after two days of use.
My armor is taking a beating. Any good repair guys around?
Check with Nimble. Hes expensive but does quality work.
Just duct tape it like the rest of us, fancy boy.
There is a guy in the swamps. Weird, but skilled.
Anyone know how to treat controller induced psychosis?
Psy block and lots of vodka. Keep them sedated for 48 hours.
Once the brain is scrambled, there's no going back.
Ive seen guys recover. Takes weeks and they are never the same.
Got a deep gash from a bloodsucker claw. Bleeding wont stop.
Their claws have anticoagulant. Need to cauterize it NOW.
Pack it with artifact dust. Hurts like hell but stops bleeding.
Get to a medic fast. Bloodsucker wounds go septic quick.
Artifact prices crashed again. Market is flooded with fakes.
Thats what happens when every rookie thinks they are a treasure hunter.
Good for us. Means real artifacts will spike in value soon.
Time to switch to gun running. More stable income.
New trader in town claims he can get NATO gear. Legit or scam?
Saw his inventory. Either stolen or fake, but it works.
Military has been losing shipments. Connect the dots.
Who cares where it is from if the price is right?
Sky turned purple for three hours yesterday. Never seen that before.
New emission type maybe? Zone is evolving.
My hair stood on end the whole time. Electrical charge was insane.
Old timers say it happens before major Zone shifts.
Animals have been migrating south all week. What do they know that we don't?
Animals sense danger. Time to follow their lead.
Probably just seasonal. Don't read too much into it.
Last time this happened, half the northern sectors became uninhabitable.
Anomaly fields shifting after emissions? My safe route's now death trap.
Zone rearranges like a living thing. Never trust yesterday's path.
Buy updated anomaly maps from guide at Skadovsk. Worth every ruble.
First time in the Zone. Whats the number one rule?
Trust no one. Not even yourself after a psi storm.
Always save one bullet for yourself. Better than some deaths here.
If it looks safe, it's a trap. If it looks dangerous, its worse.
Which artifact should a newcomer focus on collecting?
Start with Jellyfish—healing properties and reasonably stable fields.
Try Mushrooms near emission sites—low risk and decent rad protection.
Avoid anomalies until you’ve got at least a decent detector. Chasing ghosts nets nothing.
Is it true you can tame mutants with the right artifacts?
Sure, if you want a pet that eats your face while you sleep.
One guy tried with a pseudodog. Found pieces of him everywhere.
Mutants arent pets. They're death with legs.
Whats the fastest way to get rich in the Zone?
Die quick and leave your gear to someone smarter.
Slow and steady wins. Fast money means fast death.
Rob other stalkers. But then you become everyones target.
Should I join a squad or stay solo?
Squads give protection but also paint targets on your back.
Solo means no backup when shit hits the fan.
Join whoever pays best. Loyalty is a luxury here.
How do you deal with nightmares after seeing your first controller victim?
Vodka helps. So does not sleeping.
You don't. They become part of you. Welcome to the Zone.
Focus on survival. Dead men don't have nightmares.
Is the Wish Granter real or just a legend?
Real enough to kill everyone who looks for it.
It grants wishes alright, when you're dreaming.
Focus on staying alive. Wishes are for fairy tales.
Best weapon for a beginner with limited funds?
Sawed off shotgun. Cheap, reliable, and mutants hate it.
Whatever you can maintain. Fancy gun that jams is useless.
Your brain. Smart stalkers live longer than well armed idiots.
How accurate are the Zone maps they sell at the bar?
About as accurate as a blind mans drawings.
Zone changes daily. Maps are suggestions at best.
Good enough to get you lost, not good enough to get you found.
Whats the deal with the Brain Scorcher? Can it really be turned off?
Sure, just walk up and flip the switch. We will collect your body later.
Some say its been done. None of them are sane enough to confirm.
Worry about surviving before tackling Zone Legends.
How can I tell a real artifact from a fake?
Real ones pulse in your hand. If it’s cold and lifeless, toss it.
Check the readout on your PDA, fakes show inconsistent radiation spikes.
Ask a veteran to field-test it. Their detector will tell the tale.
Any tips for surviving my first emission?
Find concrete cover at least 50 m away before the pulse hits.
Keep an eye out on PDA chatter, lot of Stalkers will give out warnings.
I've found that most covers within reason work.
Should I carry grenades or load up extra mags?
Extra mags, close fights favor sustained fire over one big bang.
One or two grenades can clear a room, but don’t overdo it.
Balance is key: frag for crowds, ammo for single targets.
How do I disinfect wounds if I run out of medkits?
Vodka works in a pinch—pour it over the cut and wrap it tight.
Burn a clean cloth over a flame and use as makeshift bandage.
Honey from your rations has antiseptic qualities—apply sparingly.
What’s the safest way to approach a sniper’s nest?
Stay low, use cover, and take your time to find the advantage point.
Flank from the side—snipers rarely check their six o’clock.
Smoke grenades buy time. Move under the cloud and keep your head down.
Someone's been lifting ammo from my stash. I'm not fucking around—own up before I start checking bags.
If it’s missing, you were careless. Secure your shit next time.
You think threats help? Maybe someone needed it more than you.
Relax. It was probably some rookie who thought 5.45 fits everything.
If I find out who it was, I'll help you bury the body.
Who the hell shot at me near the tower yesterday? I was in plain view, you blind bastard.
If you don't want to get shot, stop creeping around like a damn bloodsucker.
Mistakes happen. Be glad you’re still breathing.
Next time wear something that doesn’t scream ‘hostile.’
That wasn’t a mistake. Maybe someone just doesn’t like you.
That scumbag at the checkpoint sold me a busted rifle and called it “battle-tested.”
Sounds like battle-tested by a blind chimp. Demand a refund—or a beating.
Every trader’s a liar until proven otherwise. Strip it down next time.
Next time buy from someone who doesn’t smell like vodka and desperation.
You expected honesty in the Zone? That’s adorable.
Why the hell did our patrol leader send us through an anomaly field with no scanner? Two men down for nothing.
Same shit different day. Leadership here means louder voice, not smarter brain.
File it under "Zone accidents" and keep your boots moving.
Next time, question the orders. Or bring your own damn scanner.
Men die. Gear gets lost. Welcome to the Zone’s idea of a briefing.
Someone went through my stash last night. If I find out who it was, I’ll leave pieces of you scattered from here to Jupiter.
Should’ve buried it deeper, rookie. The Zone eats the careless.
If you stash it, it's up for grabs. That’s the rule, crybaby.
If you’re too soft to guard your gear, maybe you should pack up and go back to momma.
Welcome to the Zone. Lock it up or shut the hell up.
He left me behind when things went loud. Ran like a rat. If he shows his face again, I’ll break his jaw.
Zone reveals character. Looks like he didn’t have any.
Handle it quiet, or handle it loud. Just don’t come crying here.
Put a round in his knee and tell him to run again. See how far he gets.
Next time choose someone with balls, not a coward in boots.
Guy took a bullet and the medic sat there counting bandages. He bled out like a pig in front of us.
Call him a medic again and I’ll puke. He’s a butcher with a bandage fetish.
You want proper first aid? Wrong damn place, friend.
Next time, do it yourself or carry morphine. Don’t rely on incompetents.
Zone doesn’t wait. You freeze, someone dies. End of story.
We called for backup for over fifteen minutes in the radio. Nothing. You bastards just sat on your asses.
Maybe we just didn’t feel like dying for you. Think about that.
You think anyone gives a shit out here? Grow up.
You’re lucky we even read the damn message. Half of us delete them on sight.
Zone’s full of ghosts. Guess we figured you were already one of them.
I swear this new guy, who the hell trained this fucking guy, Bastard nearly blew my head off last night. Wrong target, wrong time, every damn time.
Maybe you should wear a sign that says "Not an Enemy", dumbass.
If he’s still breathing tomorrow, you’ve got no one to blame but yourself.
“Friendly fire” my ass. Some people just shouldn’t be holding guns.
They promised twenty thousand for that job. Got back and they gave me six and a pat on the back. Screw every one of those lying parasites.
Should’ve known. If the pay sounds fair, it’s a trap. If it sounds good, it’s a con.
You let them get away with that? You’re part of the problem.
They feed you shit and you ask for seconds. Don’t expect pity from me.
Zone taxes the stupid. Guess you just got audited.
They had us loop through Bloodsucker territory with zero intel. Two men gone, and for what? A broken Geiger and some rusted tools?
Maybe next time don’t follow orders from someone who hasn’t got the field experience.
You should’ve turned around. No loot’s worth a zipped-up body bag.
Two men dead, and for scraps. Guess loyalty’s a one-way street out here.
Old man Gromov was watching the rookie’s back. Rookie froze. Gromov took a round to the gut. He died calling out for help that never came.
Zone doesn’t care if you’re green or grey. It just eats the slower one.
Gromov should’ve let that little shit learn the hard way. Now we’ve lost a legend for a coward.
Rookies don’t deserve escorts. They deserve body bags with their name pre-printed.
If I see that rookie smiling, I swear I’ll knock every tooth out of his head.
We got ambushed because someone fed our route to enemy scouts. I know it. No way they just “stumbled” on us mid-transfer. Someone sold us out.
Hope they enjoy the cash. I’m going to find them, and they’re going to need it for burial costs.
If one of ours did this… I’ll put their head on a pike at the checkpoint.
First hint I get, I’m dragging them out by the ankles. Alive. Bleeding.
Zone’s full of monsters. But the worst ones know how to speak our language.
They ran. Left Danya to bleed out in a ditch. He begged for help on the radio. I heard it. Cowards didn’t even go back for the body.
I hope the rats got there before the dogs did. They deserve to see what they abandoned.
Leave a brother to die, and you forfeit the right to call yourself a stalker.
One of them ever sets foot in this camp again, they’re leaving without kneecaps.
Next time I’ll leave *them* in the mud. See how they like it.
They caught Viktor. Held him for days. Ripped his fingers off one by one. Just to find our stash. Then slit his throat when he finally broke.
They’ll wish they never touched him. I’m going to peel their skin off with wire.
I hope whatever they stole rots in their hands. Because I'm coming, and I'm not bringing mercy.
I don’t want justice. I want screams. I want blood in the dust.
The Zone took Viktor. Now it owes me a debt of flesh.
He wasn’t even a fighter. Just a scav looking for scrap to sell to feed his family back home. They shot him anyway. No warning, no question. Just a laugh and a bullet.
Some people forget there’s still lines you don’t cross — or at least there used to be.
If we don’t put that bastard down, we’re just as guilty.
Zone doesn't judge. But I do. And I say he dies for what he did.
You kill the helpless, you die helpless. That’s how it should be.
